mapper.select: update INSBCoreriskmap set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},inscomname = #{inscomname},riskcode = #{riskcode},riskname = #{riskname},riskkindcode = #{riskkindcode},riskkindname = #{riskkindname},cmcartype = #{cmcartype},cmriskcode = #{cmriskcode},cmriskname = #{cmriskname},cmriskkindcode = #{cmriskkindcode},cmriskkindname = #{cmriskkindname} where id = #{id}
